attributes.review: I got this app so I can see that the person over my country is doing a great thing but me seeing all he has done has been very bad

attributes.title: glitchy and high pitched noises
attributes.review: this app made my phone glitch so bad whenever i went into it and my phone would stay glitchy for 30 mins after. i think it needs an update. the app also played a noise that was very high pitched , it was kinda scary. sometimes it would glitch me out of the app and shut off my phone. not a fan

attributes.title: Walter
attributes.review: Absolutely horrible. Made my kids hate me and turned my wife into a lesbian! I really hope Mr Donald J Trump realizes that his app is horrible, and all the people giving it a five star review are just snowflakes looking for attention ❄️❄️❄️❄️

attributes.title: Gives viruses
attributes.review: This app is worse than corona. It made my phone glitch in unspeakable ways. I was trying to support the loser of the 2020 election but  the app is completely broken. I am disgusted. Biden 2020
